long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ¤– An innovative search engine - Qwant is changing the way people search the web thanks to its new artificial intelligence, which is capable of providing you with short, precise answers. Directly integrated into the search engine, this AI accompanies you in your daily life to answer your many questions on a wide range of subjects: news, culture, sport, administrative information... And of course, it's free.

ğŸ¤‘ Do your research and earn money - Thanks to our loyalty programme, Qwant shares part of the revenue generated by advertising with you. The principle is simple: do searches, collect points, earn up to 10 euros a week. From Monday to Sunday, your searches on the computer and on the Qwant mobile application earn you points that help you climb the rankings. Every week, the top finishers are rewarded!

ğŸ” Qwant respects its users - Qwant is THE search engine that respects its users. You are not a product, which is why Qwant has always kept its commitments not to keep your search history and not to resell your personal data. On mobile, the Qwant application goes beyond its function as a search engine and becomes a browser that lets you browse the web in complete security.

Qwant, the search engine where you are the user, not the product!
